description: Street Art and Murals can be found in many places across London. They are artistic expressions that can be challenging, thought provoking, funny or beautiful. We will explore the area of Brixton and see the art that celebrates a community.

factsheet.heading: Brixton Street Art a Celebration of a Community
paragraphs:
Street Art and Murals can be found in many places across London. They are artistic expressions that can be challenging, thought provoking, funny or beautiful. Some will remain for
a long time, others defaced or painted over. Through this virtual tour we can cover central Brixton, Brixton Hill and some areas just a little further away.
Led by Angela Morgan who focuses on Black History.

factsheet.heading: Featured artists
paragraphs: These are some of the artists whose work is featured in the virtual tour: Jimmy C, WOM Collective,  Icreatenotdestroy, Lucy Casson, Maggie Hambling, Mr Cenz, Tizer, Charles Mackesy, & Artful Dodger.
